Translations.Text: Tiel Li komplet 7 univers 2 tag set legx cxiu univers! Ni ornam lowest univers lamp ej gard gxi! Such est desegn Almighty Omniscient
Ili turn tiam dir mi avert vi de disaster disaster annihilated ‘Aad Thamoud
Their messengers ir them ankaux as antaux them post them dir Vi ne worship DI. Ili dir Hav our Lord willed Li send angxel! Ni est disbelievers ki vi dir
As por ‘Aad ili torn arrogant ter opposed truth dir Who powerful than ni? est ili ne realize ti DI kre them est powerful than ili? Ili est unappreciative de our revelations
Consequently ni send them violent vent a few miserable tag. Ni tiel aflikt them humiliating retribution en this life retribution Hereafter est humiliating ili neniam win
As por Thamoud ni proviz them guidance ili prefer blindness guidance. Consequently disastrous shameful retribution annihilated them ki ili earned
Ni cxiam sav those kred plumb righteous life
Tag ven when enemies de DI testament summoned hellfire forcibly
Once ili get tie their own auxd okul hauxt bor witness cxio ili done
